summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th avenue South, from Day Street to Irving Street; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 98390 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
